entry.title: Lavender & Rooibos Tea | Lavender in Lavender Hill (20 bags)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Health Teas
Price: 56.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender & Rooibos Tea (20 bags) are vegan-friendly and free of caffeine or other additives!

  • A delicious blend of lavender flowers and leaves, with traditional South African Rooibos
  • A warm cup of this Lavender & Rooibos Tea will help you wind down, de-stress and relax
  • Perfect before bedtime!
  • Full of antioxidants, as well as anti-inflammatory and soothing properties
  • Calms digestive discomfort, relieves constipation & indigestion
  • No artificial flavours or colourants, caffeine, preservatives or cruelty!
  • Teabags are packed in a foil pack which can be recycled
  • Vegan-friendly
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients 

Dried Lavender Flowers & Leaves, Rooibos Leaves

How to use

Steep a bag for 2-5 minutes before adding organic honey or milk.

entry.title: Blissful Baby Massage Oil: Massage oil for babies over 12 weeks old
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 117.00

Feelgood Health's Blissful Baby Massage Oil  contains a blend of aromatherapy oils especially chosen for babies over 12 weeks old. 
  • Pure aromatherapy essential oils calm and relax your baby
  • Massage strengthens the bonding process
  • Soothes teething and colicky babies 
  • For improved circulation throughout your baby’s body
  • For after-bath or bedtime relaxation to assist with sleep
  • Aids neurological development through massage
  • Pure aromatherapy essential oils 

Ingredients

Mandarin essential oil, Chamomile essential oil,  Neroli essential oil, Almond oil (carrier oil)

 

Directions for use

With aromatherapy, a little goes a long way!  Pour a little oil into the palm of the hand and rub together to warm the oil.  Massage slowly and gently, avoiding the face and genital area. Lovely to use anytime, but especially after a bath or before bedtime! 

(Tip: You can also use a cap full in the bath before bedtime!) 

Note:
Not recommended for babies under 3 months. May contain traces of nut oil. For external use only.

 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Colic Calmer - Natural homeopathic remedy for babies treats infant colic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Granules
Price: 117.00

Colic Calmer is a natural homeopathic remedy that gently and safely calms the colic chaos and helps babies to sleep
  • Safely soothes infant colic & infant reflux
  • Soothes and calms your baby and promotes peaceful sleep
  • Promotes digestive comfort & health & soothes infant reflux
  • Alcohol-free with no preservatives
  • Easy to use - simply sprinkle on the tongue!
  • Natural homeopathic formula

Ingredients

Chamomilla (6C) is a well-known homeopathic remedy for infant colic, digestive comfort and teething.
Mag Phos (6C) is an effective and gentle homeopathic painkiller and is often recommended to safely treat cramping pain. It is suitable for all age groups including small babies

Lactose (inactive ingredient)

Directions:

Colic Calmer is presented in fine granules called 'sprinkles', that dissolve easily on the tongue making it easy to administer to babies.

Sprinkle a small pinch of Colic Calmer on your baby’s tongue at the very first signs of colic for quick relief. Dosage may be repeated every 20 minutes for up to 10 doses if necessary.

Note: If symptoms persist or worsen, a health care professional should be consulted. Keep this and all medicines from the reach of children.

Note:
Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Worm Dr - Eradicate worms with natural herbal worm medicine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Worm Dr is a 100% natural, herbal & homeopathic vermifuge (a natural remedy that helps to expel worms). Worm Dr will help to eradicate all types of intestinal worms in children and in adults and will also promote a healthy digestive tract. (50 ml)
  • Assists the body to naturally eradicate intestinal worms & systemic parasites
  • Boosts the body’s immune system
  • Promotes balance in the digestive system
  • Safe for adults and children

Ingredients

Worm Dr contains the following natural ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal and homeopathic formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Glycorrhiza Glabra (licorice root), Agrimonia Eupatoria (Agrimony), Althea Officinalis (Marshmallow), Artemesia africana (Wormwood or Wilde-Als), Chamomilla (30C), Cina (30C), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Worm Dr comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

Directions:
Children 15 years and under: Use one drop per age year of the child.
Adults and children over 16 years: 15 - 20 drops.

Dilute in approx. 1/4 glass of water or juice before breakfast for four days. Repeat after two weeks.

Caution:
Not recommended for children under one year old or during pregnancy unless under medical supervision. Please consult a doctor should symptoms persist.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: How to get rid of worms naturally

entry.title: Du Du Drops - Homeopathic remedy to help children sleep naturally
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Tincture
Price: 121.50

Du Du Drops is a safe and effective homeopathic remedy specially formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to calm and relax toddlers and young children and induce a state of drowsiness. Use from 1 year up. (Note Babies 0 - 12 months use Sleepy Sprinkles)

  • Top Selling all-natural sleep remedy for babies & children
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to help children sleep
  • Prevents night time behavioural problems & restores healthy, regular sleep patterns
  • Relaxes & calms your child & promotes natural, peaceful sleep
  • Also assists with sleep problems caused by teething

Ingredients

Chamomilla (6C), Cina (30C), Coffea (30C), Pulsatilla (6C)

Directions

Dilute 5 drops in a teaspoon of milk or water just before bedtime or add to the bedtime bottle. May be repeated after 15 minutes if necessary or during the night up to 5 doses.

For babies younger than 12 months: Use Sleepy Sprinkles

Children over 12 years: Use Feelgood Health's Serenite Plus Drops for teenagers and adults.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Homeopathic remedy to help children sleep
Natural remedy to help children fall asleep

entry.title: Baltic Amber Teething Necklace (Mixed)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: Baby
Price: 146.50

Baltic Amber For Africa's Mixed Teething Necklace naturally soothes the symptoms of teething and irritability.

  • Carefully crafted using a mix of four different colours of Amber beads
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Naturally soothes sore and swollen gums without the use of medication
  • Reduces inflammation and clears red cheeks
  • Reduces drooling and calms irritability
  • Improves sleep and boosts immunity 

How can an amber teething necklace help your teething baby?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process of how Baltic Amber aids against inflammation and pain is unclear, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help teething babies with sore and swollen gums, without the use of medication!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

Baltic amber teething necklaces are suitable for babies from 8 weeks and older and are safe for use during the day or the night. You can start using an amber teething necklace even before your baby starts teething. This will help your baby to become comfortable with the necklace and the sooner your baby starts wearing the necklace, the less likely he or she will be to tug on it. Your baby will also be able to immediately benefit from the healing and protective properties of the amber. 

The necklace is worn around your baby's neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and pain relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your baby's skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber teething necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber teething necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber teething necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed.

entry.title: Baltic Amber Necklace for ADHD Children
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: ADHD
Price: 190.00

Baltic Amber for Africa's ADHD Necklace aids concentration and inner-peace in people who suffer from Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD).

  • This amber and gemstone necklace aids concentration and brings a sense of inner calm and groundedness
  • The crystals also ease other difficulties which may be associated with ADHD such as anxiety, depression, upset or anger
  • Carefully crafted using Cognac Amber, Smokey Quartz, Sodalite and Fluorite
  • Smokey Quartz helps you to feel grounded and is beneficial in times of stress. Smokey quartz helps to instill feelings of calmness and aids in releasing fear, especially when this is linked to failure. The grounding properties of this stone help ease hyperactivity and staying on task.
  • Sodalite helps to clear mental confusion and restore inner peace that has been disrupted. It encourages effective communication and calms the mind, increasing it’s ability to take in and process new information and focus.
  • Fluorite is said to absorb and neutralize all negative energies and is also known as the “Genius Stone,” as it increases concentration and helps in decision-making. Fluorite clears your mind of confusion, cluttered
    thoughts and negativity. Fluorite heightens mental abilities, assisting in rapid organisation and processing of information.
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Circumference size: 36 cm

How can an amber necklace help those with ADHD?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process is unclear of how Baltic Amber is therapeutic, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation, discomfort and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help those struggling with ADHD!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

The necklace is worn around your neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and stress relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber ADHD necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!

entry.title: Flaxseed & Lavender Heat Therapy Bag (Apricot Rainbows) | FLAXiToddler
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 90.00

FLAXi's Apricot Rainbows Heat Therapy Bag is a beautifully 100% cotton flannel hand printed heat therapy bag for toddlers' bumps, bruises, growing pains, fevers and sleep issues.

  • Natural heat therapy bag for aches and pains
  • Removable and washable cover
  • Bag made from 100% natural cotton flannel inner bag filled with linseed and lavender, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender
  • Size: 100x200mm

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

entry.title: Sniffly Sprinkles: Homeopathic cold & 'flu remedy for children and babies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Granules
Price: 117.00

Sniffly Sprinkles is a safe and effective 100% homeopathic remedy formulated to safely reduce the symptoms of colds and 'flu in babies and young children. 
  • Keeps little chests & noses clear & encourages easy breathing
  • Promotes sound and healthy sleep
  • Helps to avoid the antibiotic cycle
  • Easy to use - simply sprinkle on the tongue!
  • Safe for all ages, including newborns
  • Locally manufactured to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Sniffly Sprinkles contains the following 100% active homeopathic ingredients in baby-safe therapeutic dosage:

Nat Mur (6C), Nux vom (6C), Alium cepa (6C), Ferrum phos (D6), Windflower (6C), Influenzinum (30C), Baccillum (30C), Sucrose (inactive ingredient)

Sniffly Sprinkles contains no gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. 

Our products are animal-cruelty free. Individual ingredients are well-researched and are natural, safe and effective.

Directions for use

Directions:

Sniffly Sprinkles are presented in fine granules (we call them 'sprinkles') that dissolve easily on the tongue making this remedy easy to administer to babies.

Sprinkle a pinch onto the tongue every hour until symptoms subside. Thereafter use three times daily for 2 - 3 days.

Caution: Always consult a doctor or health professional if you are concerned or need advice about your baby’s health. Keep this and all medicines out of reach of children.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

AFRO Indigenous's Night Pillow Mist (50ml) contains a magical blend of indigenous essential oils to promote deep, peaceful sleep and good dreams!

  • Spray on your pillow to induce relaxation and ease tension of the mind and muscles (for children, too!)
  • Contains natural ingredients used in African Traditional Medicine to balance mood, depression, anxiety and stress
  • Makes a lovely, local gift!

African Helichrysum Essential Oil, Cape Chamomile Essential Oil, Rose Geranium, blended in water with emollients

How to use

Spray the Night Pillow Mist onto your pillow before bed.

Ohm Oils' Wood Grain Ultrasonic Cool Mist Aroma Diffuser (200ml) improves your home’s atmosphere quality, covers unwanted smells, and releases the therapeutic mist of your favourite essential oils into your space.
  • Ultrasonic technology to create a soft environment by adding essential oils
  • Suitable for spas, salons, offices, kids' rooms, living rooms, etc.

  • Refreshes and moisturizes the air for rooms of 20-40 m²
  • Safe for children and pregnant women
  • Diffuser will switch off automatically when time is up or water runs out (safer, especially for children)
  • The LED can be set to 7 different gentle and soothing colors
BPA-free
Light: Warm light & 7 color LED light
Working time: 6-8 hours
Product size: 93x157mm
Usage area: 20-40 m²

entry.title: Ohm Organic Neem Oil (for skin, hair, garden AND home!)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Oils
Price: 50.00

Ohm Oil's Neem Oil (50ml) is an age-old popular ingredient used in skin care, hair care, in gardens, and home products.
  • Antibacterial, antimicrobial, biopesticide, insecticide, insect repellent and fungicide for skin, scalp, gardens and home
  • Effective and popular non-toxic lice treatment
  • A natural alternative to chemical flea and mites control (for dogs only)
  • Effective garden and home pest control - biodegradable and non-toxic to wildlife, mammals, birds, earthworms, or beneficial insects such as butterflies, bees and ladybirds - will not pollute ground water
  • Powerful antioxidant, moisturiser and revitaliser
  • Healing for acne-prone skin types and problematic skin (redness, itchiness and irritations like eczema and various dermatitis)
  • Good for dry skin and dandruff
  • Redcues pigmentation and scars
  • Protects skin against infections, boils and ulcers
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Pure organic Neem Oil

How to use

Can be used directly on hair and skin, or you can add it to your cosmetic products. Perfect to mix into sprays to be used in the garden and home.

Neem Oil is often diluted with other carrier oils, but for head lice treatments, it's best to use on its own. Massage into scalp and comb through the hair with a fine tooth comb, removing any lice or nits in this process. Wrap the hair in plastic or a shower cap and leave on for an hour or longer. Remove the Neem Oil with shampoo. Repeat this procedure 2-3 times per week until the nits and lice are no longer present.

entry.title: Baltic Amber Teething Necklace (Cognac)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baltic Amber for Africa
Type: Baby
Price: 146.50

Baltic Amber For Africa's Cognac Teething Necklace naturally soothes the symptoms of teething and irritability.

  • Carefully crafted using rounded, polished Cognac Amber beads
  • Design feature to protect against choking if the necklace is pulled hard
  • As an additional safety feature, there is a knot before and after each bead so that in the event of it being broken, there is no risk of choking on the beads
  • Naturally soothes sore and swollen gums without the use of medication
  • Reduces inflammation and clears red cheeks
  • Reduces drooling and calms irritability
  • Improves sleep and boosts immunity 

How can an amber teething necklace help your teething baby?

Baltic amber has been used for thousands of years for its beauty and healing properties. Although the exact process of how Baltic Amber aids against inflammation and pain is unclear, it is thought that when Baltic amber warms against the skin, it creates an electromagnetic field and releases succinic acid, a natural healing oil that aids against inflammation and pain. This makes Baltic amber the perfect natural solution to help teething babies with sore and swollen gums, without the use of medication!

Ancient people believed that Baltic amber would give courage to the wearer, ward off evil spirits, protect against disease, strengthen the human spirit and purify the soul. To this day Baltic amber is believed to have spiritual properties that provide psychic protection and aid manifestations.

Baltic amber is also referred to as an Adaptogen, which aids in the body's ability to deal with changes in the environment and stress. 

Directions for use

Baltic amber teething necklaces are suitable for babies from 8 weeks and older and are safe for use during the day or the night. You can start using an amber teething necklace even before your baby starts teething. This will help your baby to become comfortable with the necklace and the sooner your baby starts wearing the necklace, the less likely he or she will be to tug on it. Your baby will also be able to immediately benefit from the healing and protective properties of the amber. 

The necklace is worn around your baby's neck and the beads are NOT for chewing and sucking! The healing and pain relieving process takes place when the amber beads warm against your baby's skin.

Do not use harsh detergents on your Baltic amber teething necklace. Simply rinse with warm water to clean and dry with a soft dry cloth. You can also rub the beads with a little olive oil to restore shine if needed. 

Please note: Due to the nature of this product, each amber teething necklace is slightly different - no two are exactly the same!
